It has been suspected to be an inherited condition, although some researchers believe it may be caused by prenatal blockage of the carotid artery where it enters the cranium. Treatment is generally symptomatic and supportive; hydrocephalus may be treated with a shunt.",GARD,Hydranencephaly
What are the treatments for Hydranencephaly ?,"How might hydranencephaly be treated? Unfortunately, there is no definitive treatment for hydranencephaly.
